```{r}
library(openxlsx)
library(here)
library(dplyr)
```

## Loading data

```{r}
data1 <- read.xlsx(here("all_data.xlsx"))

```

## Merge PH & MH

```{r}
all_data$Health_issue <- ifelse(all_data$PH == "Y" | all_data$MH == "Y", 1, 0)
all_data$Belief_new <- ifelse(all_data$Belief == "Y", 1, 0)
```

## Glm Belief~Health_issue
```{r}
model <- glm(Belief_new ~ Health_issue, family = "binomial", data = all_data)
summary(model)
```
## Glm + confounders ï¼ˆadd region later)
```{r}
model <- glm(Belief_new ~ Health_issue + Smoker + SES5 + Gender + Region, family = "binomial", data = all_data)
summary(model)
```
